item.title: Sex differences in health and survival
item.description: Why do men die earlier but appear healthier? And why don’t baboons show this same pattern?

item.title: Responses to early-life adversity
item.description: To what extent can primates overcome a bad start in life?

item.title: Primate Life History Database
item.description: An exceptional archive of primate life history data.

item.title: Maternal age effects on offspring
item.description: Are aspects of offspring fitness affected by maternal age?
